title: Play-Based Deep Learning Space Design: Application of Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic teaching methodologies and learning space design principles
context.additional_context: A course where pre-/in-service teachers experience designing and operating creative learning spaces incorporating playful elements

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more learning space design frameworks that incorporate play-based principles.
Learners can develop at least one play-based instructional module that promotes intellectual, physical, and emotional growth through experiential activities.
Learners can implement and evaluate two or more blended play-learning activities using digital tools (BYOD environment).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
